trans-unit.source: Diagnostics and Error Recovery for Import/Export Jobs
trans-unit.target: Diagnostics and Error Recovery for Import/Export Jobs

trans-unit.source: For each drive processed, the Azure Import/Export service creates an error log in the associated storage account.
trans-unit.target: For each drive processed, the Azure Import/Export service creates an error log in the associated storage account.

trans-unit.source: You can also enable verbose logging by setting the <languageKeyword>EnableVerboseLog</languageKeyword> property to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> when calling the <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> or <link xlink:href="6f83d480-c09e-4e3b-b096-46e140e8c93d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Job Properties</link> operations.
trans-unit.target: You can also enable verbose logging by setting the <languageKeyword>EnableVerboseLog</languageKeyword> property to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> when calling the <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> or <link xlink:href="6f83d480-c09e-4e3b-b096-46e140e8c93d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Job Properties</link> operations.

trans-unit.source: By default, logs are written to a container named <languageKeyword>waimportexport</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: By default, logs are written to a container named <languageKeyword>waimportexport</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: You can specify a different name by setting the <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesPath</languageKeyword> property when calling the <languageKeyword>Put Job</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>Update Job Properties</languageKeyword> operations.
trans-unit.target: You can specify a different name by setting the <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesPath</languageKeyword> property when calling the <languageKeyword>Put Job</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>Update Job Properties</languageKeyword> operations.

trans-unit.source: The logs are stored as block blobs with the following naming convention: <codeInline>waies/jobname_driveid_timestamp_logtype.xml</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The logs are stored as block blobs with the following naming convention: <codeInline>waies/jobname_driveid_timestamp_logtype.xml</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the URI of the logs for a job by calling the <link xlink:href="1d416186-c5a7-423c-9a24-bad4f7b89828" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Job</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: You can retrieve the URI of the logs for a job by calling the <link xlink:href="1d416186-c5a7-423c-9a24-bad4f7b89828" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Job</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: The URI for the verbose log is returned in the <languageKeyword>VerboseLogUri</languageKeyword> property for each drive, while the URI for the error log is returned in the <languageKeyword>ErrorLogUri</languageKeyword> property.
trans-unit.target: The URI for the verbose log is returned in the <languageKeyword>VerboseLogUri</languageKeyword> property for each drive, while the URI for the error log is returned in the <languageKeyword>ErrorLogUri</languageKeyword> property.

trans-unit.source: You can use the logging data to identify the following issues:
trans-unit.target: You can use the logging data to identify the following issues:

trans-unit.source: Drive Errors
trans-unit.target: Drive Errors

trans-unit.source: Errors in accessing or reading the manifest file
trans-unit.target: Errors in accessing or reading the manifest file

trans-unit.source: Incorrect BitLocker keys
trans-unit.target: Incorrect BitLocker keys

trans-unit.source: Drive read/write errors
trans-unit.target: Drive read/write errors

trans-unit.source: Blob Errors
trans-unit.target: Blob Errors

trans-unit.source: Incorrect or conflicting blob or names
trans-unit.target: Incorrect or conflicting blob or names

trans-unit.source: Missing files
trans-unit.target: Missing files

trans-unit.source: Blob not found
trans-unit.target: Blob not found

trans-unit.source: Truncated files (the files on the disk are smaller than specified in the manifest)
trans-unit.target: Truncated files (the files on the disk are smaller than specified in the manifest)

trans-unit.source: Corrupted file content (for import jobs, detected with an MD5 checksum mismatch)
trans-unit.target: Corrupted file content (for import jobs, detected with an MD5 checksum mismatch)

trans-unit.source: Corrupted blob metadata and property files (detected with an MD5 checksum mismatch)
trans-unit.target: Corrupted blob metadata and property files (detected with an MD5 checksum mismatch)

trans-unit.source: Incorrect schema for the blob properties and/or metadata files
trans-unit.target: Incorrect schema for the blob properties and/or metadata files

trans-unit.source: There may be cases where some parts of an import or export job do not complete successfully, while the overall job still completes.
trans-unit.target: There may be cases where some parts of an import or export job do not complete successfully, while the overall job still completes.

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can either upload or download the missing pieces of the data over network, or you can create a new job to transfer the data.
trans-unit.target: In this case, you can either upload or download the missing pieces of the data over network, or you can create a new job to transfer the data.

trans-unit.source: See the <link xlink:href="f77535bb-d577-438a-bdd3-e15a82e0c543" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">WAImportExport Tool Reference</link> to learn how to repair the data over network.
trans-unit.target: See the <link xlink:href="f77535bb-d577-438a-bdd3-e15a82e0c543" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">WAImportExport Tool Reference</link> to learn how to repair the data over network.
